meka.classifiers.multilabel

Class PMCC

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.classifiers.AbstractClassifier
      • weka.classifiers.SingleClassifierEnhancer
        • meka.classifiers.multilabel.ProblemTransformationMethod
          • meka.classifiers.multilabel.CC
            • meka.classifiers.multilabel.MCC
              • meka.classifiers.multilabel.PMCC
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, MultiLabelClassifier, MultiLabelDrawable, weka.classifiers.Classifier, weka.core.CapabilitiesHandler, weka.core.CapabilitiesIgnorer, weka.core.OptionHandler, weka.core.Randomizable, weka.core.RevisionHandler, weka.core.TechnicalInformationHandler

    public class PMCC
extends MCC
    PMCC.java - Like MCC but creates a population of M chains at training time (from Is candidate chains, using Monte Carlo sampling), and uses this population for inference at test time; If you are looking for a 'more typical' majority-vote ensemble method, use something like EnsembleML or BaggingML with MCC.

    NOTE: this implementation was faster, because the chain was only rebuilt from the first node which was different -- this is no longer the case (due to updates to way classifier chains works, using the CNode class).

    Version:
    Sep 2014
    Author:
    Jesse Read
    See Also:
    MCC, Serialized Form
